name: motivation
0:
”Alexa, open daily grind motivations”
”Alexa, start daily grind motivations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily grind motivations
des: Start your day with an inspirational list of quotes for the everyday person that has to work harder than ever, who works hard with no recognition . say " Alexa Open Daily Grind motivations" and hear inspirations without the "fluff" or " sugarcoat".Various phrases inspiring a person to keep going and push harder ,grinding out the workload to reach the dreams and goal. Try it, more will be added .
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
